  LNET_MATCHMD_NONE = (1 << 0), LNET_MATCHMD_OK = (1 << 1), LNET_MATCHMD_DROP = (1 << 2), LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED = (1 << 3),
  LNET_MATCHMD_FINISH = (LNET_MATCHMD_OK | LNET_MATCHMD_DROP)
